sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Script for upgrading customers to convert existing control objective reference field into related list</description>
        <name>Populate indicator template m2m content</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var template = new GlideRecord('sn_grc_indicator_template');
template.query();
while (template.next()) {
    contentId = template.getValue('content');
    if (contentId) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sn_grc_m2m_ind_temp_cont');
        gr.initialize();
        gr.indicator_template = template.getUniqueValue();
        gr.content = contentId;
        gr.insert();
    }
}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-07-30 02:19:20</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>dba62ef553921010ae9e42a336dc34c1</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>Populate indicator template m2m content</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="">53f81621cb200200829cf865734c9c58</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_dba62ef553921010ae9e42a336dc34c1</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-07-31 03:47:16</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
